thread.title: JOBS: Walmart hiring center invites veterans
thread.title_full: JOBS: Walmart hiring center invites veterans - Press Enterprise

author: RICHARD K. De ATLEY
title: JOBS: Walmart hiring center invites veterans
text:
By RICHARD K. De ATLEY / STAFF WRITER
Published: Oct. 5, 2015 11:40 a.m. Walmart has opened a temporary hiring center for its new Neighborhood Market in Hemet.
“Walmart will offer a job to any eligible U.S. veteran honorably discharged from active duty since the Veterans Welcome Home Commitment launched on Memorial Day 2013,” the company said in a statement. Interested veterans may find out more at walmartcareerswithamission.com.
The store will hire up to 65 full- and part-time associates, the majority of whom will start work in November to prepare the store for its grand opening, the company said.
The center, at 1279 S. State St., will accept applications Monday through Friday, 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Phone is 951-929-8469 .
Contact the writer: business@pe.com
